name: Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2) v.171
description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! â–º Additional Userstyles to my "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): for some userscripts (GM : Greasemonkey) i use since a long time and additional styles for some not often used Flickr's pages To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE" together in one shot: On USw NEW 2021.07: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE OR you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE - UserCSS (userstyle) Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - TÃ©lÃ©vision: TÃ©lÃ©rama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : â˜… MY â˜… Installed â˜… GM â˜… Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portraitâ˜…Faces > Portraitâ˜…Facesâ˜…Open Minded

additional_info: Find my other Userstyles: â–º UserStyles.world [USw] (the best alternative to Userstyles.org) decembre [USw] â–º USO Archives (Faster and more usable than Userstyles.org): Decembre [UserStyles.org Archive] â–¶ Note about this userstyle since V.171 On userstyles.org and Usertyles Archives (which archive for usertyles.org) only: My Code is to huge for Userstyles.org. I reduce it size with this online Tool: CSS Minifier But now it is unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch the readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post. â–¶ All My Flickr ALLinONE styles. Initially, due to the same Userstyles.org size limit, it was need to split it in 3 parts: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey But,for a better results, it's recommended to install these 3 userstyles together in one shot). You have 2 alternatives. UserStyles World (USw): Flickr WideScreen - BigONE GreasyFork: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE - UserCSS (userstyle) About this new function in GreasyFork, read: [Beta] User CSS support â–º Useful greasemonkey userscripts companions (write by me). - Flickr - AUTO ShowAllGroups (Photo Page) - Flickr - AUTO View User Infos and More Comments - Flickr - AUTO Video Play - Flickr - AUTO Video Replay - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail: This script move the Mini-thumbnail under the user buddy icon and expand it on hover while it auto load more thumbnail in it. An indicator show the origin of the mini-thumbnail: - Stream - Favs etc... I use it always to navigate in stream, favs etc.... from Photo page. â–º Greasemonkey's Scripts that i use a lot too: - Flickr â˜… Surf (USO Mirror) â–º Scripts Broken? read : Photopage scripts broken (HTTPS?) â–¶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : â–º My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2014)) - Updated 2020 â–ºâ–º Additional Userstyle for some userscripts (GM : Greasemonkey) i use since a long time: â–º Flickr Functional Suite By Charles Tilford (USO Mirror) I Use it a lot and GOOD news, the author , Charles Tilford, sent to me an Update which work with the last firefox. Thanks to him!. My Working Backup:(removed if the author update it): Flickr Functional Suite - NEW 2014 â–º Flickr PM , with my TWEAK Script : Icons/new links for "flickr PM" My Working Backup: GM - Flickr PM TWEAKED - 2016 â–º Number of Favs on Photostream Photos, and Pool pages (USO Mirror) " My Working Backup: GM - Number of Favs on Photostream (Alesadam) Tweak Https+Require â–º Stig's Flickr Fixr - Multifeature browser extensions (or userscript) â–º Flickr Cross-Recommendations - LAST Patch (USO Mirror)" Thumbnail : ADD a Reserved Space (at the Bottom of the SideBar)for its thumbnail, tweaked by me to have 3 rows of thumbs (27thumbs). My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Cross-Recommendations - NEW Flickr (avr 2015) â–º Flickr Commented On (USO MIRROR) was broken... But can be fixed : The following change to the script fixed this problem for me.... : My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Commented On (HTTPS) - TWEAK â–º Flickr Quick Links, By steeev (USO Mirror) (showing them in the Flickr Nav Bar (after Hover) â–º Flickr Buddy Interesting (USO Mirror) : Quick access to user's interesting photos from the Buddy Icon Menu. I tweak it to show quickly 250 thumbs at once(Fill all the windows) !!! My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Buddy Interesting by Pierre Andrews - TWEAK New : v.55 correction for it... â–¶Last Changes in v.47....171: My Code is to huge for Userstyles.org: I reduce it size with this onlineTool: CSS Minifier Others changes : - Add a Dark Minimal style for readability (but it's better to use my : Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey (you can remove it - Top of my CSS - if you don't like) - General Corrections (last one in first): Fav Star in Gall, Pool leave button, Recent Activity pages, Top header improve, Help Forum, Toggle Button Beta Pool, Discussions for Pool BETA, Bell Notifications, Justified (No Beta), Pool Justified No Beta (disposition) , Empty Poll, Camera Roll, Adaptation other languages, no ADS in Photo page ...... - Move Divers Counter to "Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey" (to make place...) - Improve Menu (after click on "edit" icon near buddy) on the photo page to Editing Photo (need too "ALLinONE Part 1") - Better GM "Flickr Functional Suite" on Poll/Fav/Gallery/Album. - Sup ADD in Activity Home pages ,PRO ADD in Feeds - Add support for Stig's Flickr Fixr - Multifeature browser extensions (or userscript)
